## ðŸ“¥ Skrzynka (Inbox)
```dataview
TABLE created as "Data", choice(contains(tags, "#to-verify"), "ðŸŸ ", choice(contains(file.tags, "#done"), "âœ…", choice(contains(file.tags, "#reading"), "ðŸ“–", "âšª"))) as "Status", tags as "Tagi"
```
